alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Colquitt; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 8:30PM EDT until April 06 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Northwestern Brooks County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 830 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coolidge, or 7 miles northeast of Thomasville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Moultrie, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, Berlin, Barwick, Ellenton, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Barney, Pineboro, Autreyville, Dillon, Enon, Patten, Spence Airport, Merrillville, Chastain, Dawesville and Moultrie Municipal A/P. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central Georgia.
